title: United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organization
creator_credit: Ramakantha Sarma and United Nations Films
brief_description: Illustrates the variety of work done by Unesco since its establishment in promoting educational work throughout the world. Highlights the challenge posed by the developing countries and Unesco’s contribution in a world of “rising expectations and exploding knowledge”.
